title: Refugees Live the American Dream
text:
President Trump recently signed an executive order allowing governors and mayors to stop refugee resettlement in their states and localities. It’d be a mistake to take the president up on his offer.

I understand why people might worry that the U.S. doesn’t rigorously vet refugees. In 2015, I had serious questions how the Homeland Security Department processed refugees after a Syrian passport was found on one of the perpetrators of a terror attack in Paris. description: Trump lets states opt out of resettlement. They shouldn’t do it.
